Package com.purnendu.quizo.utilities

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
com.purnendu.quizo.utilities.Constants
public class Constants extends Object
A utility class containing constant values used throughout the Quizo application. These constants include keys for SharedPreferences, intent extras, and predefined values such as points for correct/incorrect answers and date formatting patterns.
Version:
2.0.1
Author:
Purnendu Guha

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ADMIN
    SharedPreferences key or Intent extra key for admin-related data.
    static final String
    CORRECT
    Intent extra key for the number of correct answers.
    static final int
    CORRECT_POINT
    Points awarded for each correct answer.
    static final String
    DATE_FORMAT
    Date format string used for displaying timestamps (e.g., "dd MMM hh:mm a").
    static final String
    INCORRECT
    Intent extra key for the number of incorrect answers.
    static final int
    INCORRECT_POINT
    Points deducted for each incorrect answer.
    static final String
    SUBJECT
    Intent extra key for the quiz subject.
    static final String
    TOTAL_QUESTIONS_ATTEMPTED
    Intent extra key for the total number of questions attempted in a quiz.
    static final String
    USER
    SharedPreferences key or Intent extra key for user-related data.

  • Method Details

    • formatScore

      public static String formatScore(long score)
      Formats a large integer score into a more readable string using K (thousands) or M (millions) suffixes. Examples: 65000 -> 65K, 20200 -> 20.2K, 65000000 -> 65M, 1234 -> 1234
      Parameters:
      score - The integer score to format.
      Returns:
      The formatted string representation of the score.
